return (() => {                if (secondParam) {                    if (secondParam.split(":").length == 3 && secondParam.split("/").length == 3 && secondParam.split("-").length == 2) {                        const [dateComponents, timeComponents] = secondParam.split('-');                        const [day, month, year] = dateComponents.split('/');                        const [hours, minutes, seconds] = timeComponents.split(':');                        const date = new Date(+year, month - 1, +day, +hours, +minutes, +seconds);                        const timestamp = (date.getTime());                        return timestamp;                    } else {                        console.error("personatools-getTime | wrong syntax, second parameter syntax must be 'dd/mm/yy-hours:minutes:seconds'");                    }                } else {                    console.error("personatools-getTime | please type date as second parameter, syntax must be: 'dd/mm/yy-hours:minutes:seconds'");                };            })();        case "perDay":            let days;            secondParam ? days = secondParam * 24 : days = 24;            thirdParam ? thirdParam == "hours" ? days = days / 24 : null : null;            fourthParam ? null : fourthParam = "";            return (() => {                let lastclear = localStorage.getItem(`personatoolsPerDaylastclear${fourthParam}`),                    time_now = (new Date()).getTime();                if ((time_now - lastclear) > 1000 * 60 * 60 * days) {                    localStorage.removeItem(`personatoolsPerDaylastclear${fourthParam}`);                    localStorage.setItem(`personatoolsPerDaylastclear${fourthParam}`, time_now);                    return true;                } else {                    return false;                };            })();        case "betweenDates":            return (() => {                if (secondParam && thirdParam) {                    let d = new Date(),                        n = d.getTime();                    let startDate;                    let endDate;                    let timeStampConverter = (e, value) => {                        [dateComponents, timeComponents] = e.split('-');                        [day, month, year] = dateComponents.split('/');                        [hours, minutes, seconds] = timeComponents.split(':');                        let date = new Date(+year, month - 1, +day, +hours, +minutes, +seconds);                        value == "startDate" ? startDate = (date.getTime()) : endDate = (date.getTime());                    };                    if (secondParam.split("/").length == 3 && secondParam.split(":").length == 3 && secondParam.split("-").length == 2 && thirdParam.split("/").length == 3 && thirdParam.split(":").length == 3 && thirdParam.split("-").length == 2) {                        let i = 0;                        while (i < 2) {                            let e;                            let value;                            i == 0 ? e = secondParam : e = thirdParam;                            i == 0 ? value = "startDate" : value = "endDate";                            timeStampConverter(e, value);                            i++;                        };                        return n > startDate && n < endDate ? true : false;                    } else {                        if (secondParam.split("/").length == 3 && secondParam.split(":").length == 3 && secondParam.split("-").length == 2) {                            if (thirdParam == "end") {                                timeStampConverter(secondParam, "endDate");                                return n < endDate ? true : false;                            } else if (thirdParam == "start") {                                timeStampConverter(secondParam, "startDate");                                return n > startDate ? true : false;                            } else {                                console.error("personatools-betweenDates | wrong parameter, second parameter can be 'start' , 'end' , 'dd/mm/yy-hours:minutes:seconds'");                            }                        } else {                            console.error("personatools-betweenDates | wrong syntax, date parameter must be 'dd/mm/yy-hours:minutes:seconds'");                        };                    };                } else {                    console.error("personatools-betweenDates | wrong parameters, first parameter required as 'dd/mm/yy-hours:minutes:seconds' , console.error("personatools-pageCounter| please type your counter limit as second parameter");                }            })();        case "toastAlert":            return (() => {                if            function updateSegmentValues(displayElement, overlayElement, value) {                            displayElement.textContent = value;                            overlayElement.textContent = value;                        }                        function updateTimeSegment(segmentElement, timeValue) {                            const segmentElements = updateTimeSection(sectionID, timeValue) {                            if (document.querySelector(`#${containerID} #${sectionID}`)) {                                const firstNumber = Math.floor(timeValue / 10) || 0;                                const secondNumber = timeValue % 10 || 0;                                const sectionElement = document.querySelector('#' + containerID + ' #' + sectionID);                                const timeSegments = sectionElement.querySelectorAll('#' + containerID + ' .' + classLabel + 'time-segment');       function getTimeRemaining(targetDateTime) {                            const nowTime = Date.now();                            const complete = nowTime >= targetDateTime;                            if (complete) { return { complete, seconds: 0, minutes: 0, hours: 0, days: 0 }; }                            const secondsRemaining = Math.floor((targetDateTime - nowTime) / 1000);                            const days = Math.floor(secondsRemaining / (3600 * 24));                            const hours = Math.floor((secondsRemaining / 60 / 60) % 24);                            const minutes = Math.floor(secondsRemaining / 60) - Math.floor(secondsRemaining / 60 / 60) * 60;                            const seconds = secondsRemaining % 60;                            return { complete, seconds, minutes, hours, days };                        }                        function updateAllSegments() {                            const timeRemainingBits = getTimeRemaining(new Date(secondParam).getTime());                            updateTimeSection('seconds', timeRemainingBits.seconds);                            updateTimeSection('minutes', timeRemainingBits.minutes);                            updateTimeSection('hours', timeRemainingBits.hours);                            updateTimeSection('days', timeRemainingBits.days);                            return timeRemainingBits.complete;                        }                        const countdownTimer = setInterval(() => {                            const isComplete = updateAllSegments();                            if (isComplete) {                                clearInterval(countdownTimer);                                document.querySelector('#' + containerID) && document.querySelector('#' +        let snippet = document.querySelector(`script[data-personaclick_snippet_id='${snippetID}']`);        if (snippet) {            let s = document.createElement('script');            s.dataset.personaclick_snippet_id = snippet.dataset.personaclick_snippet_id;    [].forEach.call(arguments, arg => (arg.nodeType && this.appendChild(arg)));});/* if `Element.prepend` isn't supported */Element.prototype.prepend || (Element.prototype.prepend = function () {    if (arguments.length == 0 || !this.nodeType) return;    [].forEach.call(Array.apply(null, arguments).reverse(), arg => (arg.nodeType && this.insertBefore(arg, Array.apply(null, this.children).shift())));});/* if `Element.before` isn't supported */Element.prototype.before || (Element.prototype.before = function () {    if (arguments.length == 0 || !this.nodeType || !this.parentNode) return;    [].forEach.call(arguments, arg => (arg.nodeType && this.parentNode.insertBefore(arg, this)));});/* if `Element.after` isn't supported */Element.prototype.after || (Element.prototype.after = function () {    if (arguments.length == 0 || !this.nodeType || !this.parentNode) return;    let last = !this.nextElementSibling, args = last ? arguments : Array.apply(null, arguments).reverse();    [].forEach.call(args, arg => (arg.nodeType && (last ? this.parentNode.appendChild(arg) : this.parentNode.insertBefore(arg, this.nextElementSibling))));});})();</script><script data-personaclick_snippet_id="8320">(function(){const snippetId = document.currentScript.dataset.personaclick_snippet_id;const shopId = 292;let stateCheck = setInterval(() => {    try {        if (document.head && document.body) {            clearInterval(stateCheck);
